author: Mike Spector
title: Late ‘Star Trek’ Actor’s Family Settles Suit Against Fiat Chrysler
text:
The family of “Star Trek” actor Anton Yelchin settled a lawsuit brought against Fiat Chrysler Automobiles NV after his Jeep rolled away and killed him in his driveway nearly two years ago.
The settlement, filed in Los Angeles Superior Court on Tuesday, ends litigation started by Mr. Yelchin’s parents against the Italian-U.S. auto maker, the manufacturer of the vehicle. The terms of the settlement are confidential. A lawyer for the family didn’t immediately respond to a request for comment.
